procedure.name: Room_GetPaged
procedure.body:
BEGIN DECLARE @PageLowerBound int DECLARE @PageUpperBound int
-- Set the page bounds SET @PageLowerBound = @PageSize * @PageIndex SET @PageUpperBound = @PageLowerBound + @PageSize
-- Create a temp table to store the select results CREATE TABLE #PageIndex ( [IndexId] int IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL, [Id] bigint )
-- Insert into the temp table DECLARE @SQL AS nvarchar(4000) SET @SQL = 'INSERT INTO #PageIndex ([Id])' SET @SQL = @SQL + ' SELECT' IF @PageSize > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' TOP ' + CONVERT(nvarchar, @PageUpperBound) END SET @SQL = @SQL + ' [Id]' SET @SQL = @SQL + ' FROM [dbo].[Room]' IF LEN(@WhereClause) > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' WHERE ' + @WhereClause END IF LEN(@OrderBy) > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' ORDER BY ' + @OrderBy END
-- Populate the temp table EXEC sp_executesql @SQL
-- Return paged results SELECT O.[Id], O.[Title], O.[Note], O.[Status], O.[IsDisabled], O.[CreateUser], O.[CreateDate], O.[UpdateUser], O.[UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[Room] O, #PageIndex PageIndex WHERE PageIndex.IndexId > @PageLowerBound AND O.[Id] = PageIndex.[Id] ORDER BY PageIndex.IndexId
-- get row count SET @SQL = 'SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalRowCount' SET @SQL = @SQL + ' FROM [dbo].[Room]' IF LEN(@WhereClause) > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' WHERE ' + @WhereClause END EXEC sp_executesql @SQL
END

procedure.name: Room_Insert
procedure.body:
INSERT INTO [dbo].[Room] ( [Title] ,[Note] ,[Status] ,[IsDisabled] ,[CreateUser] ,[CreateDate] ,[UpdateUser] ,[UpdateDate] ) VALUES ( @Title ,@Note ,@Status ,@IsDisabled ,@CreateUser ,@CreateDate ,@UpdateUser ,@UpdateDate )
-- Get the identity value SET @Id = SCOPE_IDENTITY()

procedure.name: Room_Update
procedure.body: -- Modify the updatable columns UPDATE [dbo].[Room] SET [Title] = @Title ,[Note] = @Note ,[Status] = @Status ,[IsDisabled] = @IsDisabled ,[CreateUser] = @CreateUser ,[CreateDate] = @CreateDate ,[UpdateUser] = @UpdateUser ,[UpdateDate] = @UpdateDate WHERE [Id] = @Id

procedure.name: Room_GetByIdStatusIsDisabled
procedure.body: SELECT [Id], [Title], [Note], [Status], [IsDisabled], [CreateUser], [CreateDate], [UpdateUser], [UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[Room] WHERE [Id] = @Id AND [Status] = @Status AND [IsDisabled] = @IsDisabled SELECT @@ROWCOUNT

procedure.name: Room_Find
procedure.body:
IF ISNULL(@SearchUsingOR, 0) <> 1 BEGIN SELECT [Id] , [Title] , [Note] , [Status] , [IsDisabled] , [CreateUser] , [CreateDate] , [UpdateUser] , [UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[Room] WHERE ([Id] = @Id OR @Id IS NULL) AND ([Title] = @Title OR @Title IS NULL) AND ([Note] = @Note OR @Note IS NULL) AND ([Status] = @Status OR @Status IS NULL) AND ([IsDisabled] = @IsDisabled OR @IsDisabled IS NULL) AND ([CreateUser] = @CreateUser OR @CreateUser IS NULL) AND ([CreateDate] = @CreateDate OR @CreateDate IS NULL) AND ([UpdateUser] = @UpdateUser OR @UpdateUser IS NULL) AND ([UpdateDate] = @UpdateDate OR @UpdateDate IS NULL)
END ELSE BEGIN SELECT [Id] , [Title] , [Note] , [Status] , [IsDisabled] , [CreateUser] , [CreateDate] , [UpdateUser] , [UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[Room] WHERE ([Id] = @Id AND @Id is not null) OR ([Title] = @Title AND @Title is not null) OR ([Note] = @Note AND @Note is not null) OR ([Status] = @Status AND @Status is not null) OR ([IsDisabled] = @IsDisabled AND @IsDisabled is not null) OR ([CreateUser] = @CreateUser AND @CreateUser is not null) OR ([CreateDate] = @CreateDate AND @CreateDate is not null) OR ([UpdateUser] = @UpdateUser AND @UpdateUser is not null) OR ([UpdateDate] = @UpdateDate AND @UpdateDate is not null) SELECT @@ROWCOUNT END

Appointment_GetPaged
procedure.body:
BEGIN DECLARE @PageLowerBound int DECLARE @PageUpperBound int
-- Set the page bounds SET @PageLowerBound = @PageSize * @PageIndex SET @PageUpperBound = @PageLowerBound + @PageSize
-- Create a temp table to store the select results CREATE TABLE #PageIndex ( [IndexId] int IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL, [Id] nvarchar(20) COLLATE database_default )
-- Insert into the temp table DECLARE @SQL AS nvarchar(4000) SET @SQL = 'INSERT INTO #PageIndex ([Id])' SET @SQL = @SQL + ' SELECT' IF @PageSize > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' TOP ' + CONVERT(nvarchar, @PageUpperBound) END SET @SQL = @SQL + ' [Id]' SET @SQL = @SQL + ' FROM [dbo].[Appointment]' IF LEN(@WhereClause) > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' WHERE ' + @WhereClause END IF LEN(@OrderBy) > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' ORDER BY ' + @OrderBy END
-- Populate the temp table EXEC sp_executesql @SQL
-- Return paged results SELECT O.[Id], O.[CustomerId], O.[CustomerName], O.[ContentId], O.[ContentTitle], O.[DoctorUsername], O.[DoctorShortName], O.[RoomId], O.[RoomTitle], O.[NurseUsername], O.[NurseShortName], O.[StatusId], O.[StatusTitle], O.[Note], O.[StartTime], O.[EndTime], O.[ColorCode], O.[IsComplete], O.[IsDisabled], O.[CreateUser], O.[CreateDate], O.[UpdateUser], O.[UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[Appointment] O, #PageIndex PageIndex WHERE PageIndex.IndexId > @PageLowerBound AND O.[Id] = PageIndex.[Id] ORDER BY PageIndex.IndexId
-- get row count SET @SQL = 'SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalRowCount' SET @SQL = @SQL + ' FROM [dbo].[Appointment]' IF LEN(@WhereClause) > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' WHERE ' + @WhereClause END EXEC sp_executesql @SQL
END

procedure.name: Appointment_Update
procedure.body: -- Modify the updatable columns UPDATE [dbo].[Appointment] SET [Id] = @Id ,[CustomerId] = @CustomerId ,[CustomerName] = @CustomerName ,[ContentId] = @ContentId ,[ContentTitle] = @ContentTitle ,[DoctorUsername] = @DoctorUsername ,[DoctorShortName] = @DoctorShortName ,[RoomId] = @RoomId ,[RoomTitle] = @RoomTitle ,[NurseUsername] = @NurseUsername ,[NurseShortName] = @NurseShortName ,[StatusId] = @StatusId ,[StatusTitle] = @StatusTitle ,[Note] = @Note ,[StartTime] = @StartTime ,[EndTime] = @EndTime ,[ColorCode] = @ColorCode ,[IsComplete] = @IsComplete ,[IsDisabled] = @IsDisabled ,[CreateUser] = @CreateUser ,[CreateDate] = @CreateDate ,[UpdateUser] = @UpdateUser ,[UpdateDate] = @UpdateDate WHERE [Id] = @OriginalId

procedure.name: Appointment_GetByNurseUsername
procedure.body:
SET ANSI_NULLS OFF
SELECT [Id], [CustomerId], [CustomerName], [ContentId], [ContentTitle], [DoctorUsername], [DoctorShortName], [RoomId], [RoomTitle], [NurseUsername], [NurseShortName], [StatusId], [StatusTitle], [Note], [StartTime], [EndTime], [ColorCode], [IsComplete], [IsDisabled], [CreateUser], [CreateDate], [UpdateUser], [UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[Appointment] WHERE [NurseUsername] = @NurseUsername
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT SET ANSI_NULLS ON

procedure.name: Appointment_Find
procedure.body:
IF ISNULL(@SearchUsingOR, 0) <> 1 BEGIN SELECT [Id] , [CustomerId] , [CustomerName] , [ContentId] , [ContentTitle] , [DoctorUsername] , [DoctorShortName] , [RoomId] , [RoomTitle] , [NurseUsername] , [NurseShortName] , [StatusId] , [StatusTitle] , [Note] , [StartTime] , [EndTime] , [ColorCode] , [IsComplete] , [IsDisabled] , [CreateUser] , [CreateDate] , [UpdateUser] , [UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[Appointment] WHERE ([Id] = @Id OR @Id IS NULL) AND ([CustomerId] = @CustomerId OR @CustomerId IS NULL) AND ([CustomerName] = @CustomerName OR @CustomerName IS NULL) AND ([ContentId] = @ContentId OR @ContentId IS NULL) AND ([ContentTitle] = @ContentTitle OR @ContentTitle IS NULL) AND ([DoctorUsername] = @DoctorUsername OR @DoctorUsername IS NULL) AND ([DoctorShortName] = @DoctorShortName OR @DoctorShortName IS NULL) AND ([RoomId] = @RoomId OR @RoomId IS NULL) AND ([RoomTitle] = @RoomTitle OR @RoomTitle IS NULL) AND ([NurseUsername] = @NurseUsername OR @NurseUsername IS NULL) AND ([NurseShortName] = @NurseShortName OR @NurseShortName IS NULL) AND ([StatusId] = @StatusId OR @StatusId IS NULL) AND ([StatusTitle] = @StatusTitle OR @StatusTitle IS NULL) AND ([Note] = @Note OR @Note IS NULL) AND ([StartTime] = @StartTime OR @StartTime IS NULL) AND ([EndTime] = @EndTime OR @EndTime IS NULL) AND ([ColorCode] = @ColorCode OR @ColorCode IS NULL) AND ([IsComplete] = @IsComplete OR @IsComplete IS NULL) AND ([IsDisabled] = @IsDisabled OR @IsDisabled IS NULL) AND ([CreateUser] = @CreateUser OR @CreateUser IS NULL) AND ([CreateDate] = @CreateDate OR @CreateDate IS NULL) AND ([UpdateUser] = @UpdateUser OR @UpdateUser IS NULL) AND ([UpdateDate] = @UpdateDate OR @UpdateDate IS NULL)
END ELSE BEGIN SELECT [Id] , [CustomerId] , [CustomerName] , [ContentId] , [ContentTitle] , [DoctorUsername] , [DoctorShortName] , [RoomId] , [RoomTitle] , [NurseUsername] , [NurseShortName] , [StatusId] , [StatusTitle] , [Note] , [StartTime] , [EndTime] , [ColorCode] , [IsComplete] , [IsDisabled] , [CreateUser] , [CreateDate] , [UpdateUser] , [UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[Appointment] WHERE ([Id] = @Id AND @Id is not null) OR ([CustomerId] = @CustomerId AND @CustomerId is not null) OR ([CustomerName] = @CustomerName AND @CustomerName is not null) OR ([ContentId] = @ContentId AND @ContentId is not null) OR ([ContentTitle] = @ContentTitle AND @ContentTitle is not null) OR ([DoctorUsername] = @DoctorUsername AND @DoctorUsername is not null) OR ([DoctorShortName] = @DoctorShortName AND @DoctorShortName is not null) OR ([RoomId] = @RoomId AND @RoomId is not null) OR ([RoomTitle] = @RoomTitle AND @RoomTitle is not null) OR ([NurseUsername] = @NurseUsername AND @NurseUsername is not null) OR ([NurseShortName] = @NurseShortName AND @NurseShortName is not null) OR ([StatusId] = @StatusId AND @StatusId is not null) OR ([StatusTitle] = @StatusTitle AND @StatusTitle is not null) OR ([Note] = @Note AND @Note is not null) OR ([StartTime] = @StartTime AND @StartTime is not null) OR ([EndTime] = @EndTime AND @EndTime is not null) OR ([ColorCode] = @ColorCode AND @ColorCode is not null) OR ([IsComplete] = @IsComplete AND @IsComplete is not null) OR ([IsDisabled] = @IsDisabled AND @IsDisabled is not null) OR ([CreateUser] = @CreateUser AND @CreateUser is not null) OR ([CreateDate] = @CreateDate AND @CreateDate is not null) OR ([UpdateUser] = @UpdateUser AND @UpdateUser is not null) OR ([UpdateDate] = @UpdateDate AND @UpdateDate is not null) SELECT @@ROWCOUNT END

-- Create a temp table to store the select results CREATE TABLE #PageIndex ( [IndexId] int IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL, [Id] bigint )
-- Insert into the temp table DECLARE @SQL AS nvarchar(4000) SET @SQL = 'INSERT INTO #PageIndex ([Id])' SET @SQL = @SQL + ' SELECT' IF @PageSize > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' TOP ' + CONVERT(nvarchar, @PageUpperBound) END SET @SQL = @SQL + ' [Id]' SET @SQL = @SQL + ' FROM [dbo].[DoctorRoom]' IF LEN(@WhereClause) > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' WHERE ' + @WhereClause END IF LEN(@OrderBy) > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' ORDER BY ' + @OrderBy END
-- Populate the temp table EXEC sp_executesql @SQL
-- Return paged results SELECT O.[Id], O.[DoctorUserName], O.[DoctorShortName], O.[RoomId], O.[RoomTitle], O.[PriorityIndex], O.[IsDisabled], O.[CreateUser], O.[CreateDate], O.[UpdateUser], O.[UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[DoctorRoom] O, #PageIndex PageIndex WHERE PageIndex.IndexId > @PageLowerBound AND O.[Id] = PageIndex.[Id] ORDER BY PageIndex.IndexId
-- get row count SET @SQL = 'SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalRowCount' SET @SQL = @SQL + ' FROM [dbo].[DoctorRoom]' IF LEN(@WhereClause) > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' WHERE ' + @WhereClause END EXEC sp_executesql @SQL
END

procedure.name: DoctorRoom_GetByDoctorUserNameRoomIdIsDisabled
procedure.body: SELECT [Id], [DoctorUserName], [DoctorShortName], [RoomId], [RoomTitle], [PriorityIndex], [IsDisabled], [CreateUser], [CreateDate], [UpdateUser], [UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[DoctorRoom] WHERE [DoctorUserName] = @DoctorUserName AND [RoomId] = @RoomId AND [IsDisabled] = @IsDisabled SELECT @@ROWCOUNT

procedure.name: DoctorRoom_Find
procedure.body:
IF ISNULL(@SearchUsingOR, 0) <> 1 BEGIN SELECT [Id] , [DoctorUserName] , [DoctorShortName] , [RoomId] , [RoomTitle] , [PriorityIndex] , [IsDisabled] , [CreateUser] , [CreateDate] , [UpdateUser] , [UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[DoctorRoom] WHERE ([Id] = @Id OR @Id IS NULL) AND ([DoctorUserName] = @DoctorUserName OR @DoctorUserName IS NULL) AND ([DoctorShortName] = @DoctorShortName OR @DoctorShortName IS NULL) AND ([RoomId] = @RoomId OR @RoomId IS NULL) AND ([RoomTitle] = @RoomTitle OR @RoomTitle IS NULL) AND ([PriorityIndex] = @PriorityIndex OR @PriorityIndex IS NULL) AND ([IsDisabled] = @IsDisabled OR @IsDisabled IS NULL) AND ([CreateUser] = @CreateUser OR @CreateUser IS NULL) AND ([CreateDate] = @CreateDate OR @CreateDate IS NULL) AND ([UpdateUser] = @UpdateUser OR @UpdateUser IS NULL) AND ([UpdateDate] = @UpdateDate OR @UpdateDate IS NULL)
END ELSE BEGIN SELECT [Id] , [DoctorUserName] , [DoctorShortName] , [RoomId] , [RoomTitle] , [PriorityIndex] , [IsDisabled] , [CreateUser] , [CreateDate] , [UpdateUser] , [UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[DoctorRoom] WHERE ([Id] = @Id AND @Id is not null) OR ([DoctorUserName] = @DoctorUserName AND @DoctorUserName is not null) OR ([DoctorShortName] = @DoctorShortName AND @DoctorShortName is not null) OR ([RoomId] = @RoomId AND @RoomId is not null) OR ([RoomTitle] = @RoomTitle AND @RoomTitle is not null) OR ([PriorityIndex] = @PriorityIndex AND @PriorityIndex is not null) OR ([IsDisabled] = @IsDisabled AND @IsDisabled is not null) OR ([CreateUser] = @CreateUser AND @CreateUser is not null) OR ([CreateDate] = @CreateDate AND @CreateDate is not null) OR ([UpdateUser] = @UpdateUser AND @UpdateUser is not null) OR ([UpdateDate] = @UpdateDate AND @UpdateDate is not null) SELECT @@ROWCOUNT END

procedure.name: DoctorRoom_Find_Dynamic
Status_GetPaged
procedure.body:
BEGIN DECLARE @PageLowerBound int DECLARE @PageUpperBound int
-- Set the page bounds SET @PageLowerBound = @PageSize * @PageIndex SET @PageUpperBound = @PageLowerBound + @PageSize
-- Create a temp table to store the select results CREATE TABLE #PageIndex ( [IndexId] int IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL, [Id] bigint )
-- Insert into the temp table DECLARE @SQL AS nvarchar(4000) SET @SQL = 'INSERT INTO #PageIndex ([Id])' SET @SQL = @SQL + ' SELECT' IF @PageSize > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' TOP ' + CONVERT(nvarchar, @PageUpperBound) END SET @SQL = @SQL + ' [Id]' SET @SQL = @SQL + ' FROM [dbo].[Status]' IF LEN(@WhereClause) > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' WHERE ' + @WhereClause END IF LEN(@OrderBy) > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' ORDER BY ' + @OrderBy END
-- Populate the temp table EXEC sp_executesql @SQL
-- Return paged results SELECT O.[Id], O.[Title], O.[ColorCode], O.[Note], O.[IsDisabled], O.[CreateUser], O.[CreateDate], O.[UpdateUser], O.[UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[Status] O, #PageIndex PageIndex WHERE PageIndex.IndexId > @PageLowerBound AND O.[Id] = PageIndex.[Id] ORDER BY PageIndex.IndexId
-- get row count SET @SQL = 'SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalRowCount' SET @SQL = @SQL + ' FROM [dbo].[Status]' IF LEN(@WhereClause) > 0 BEGIN SET @SQL = @SQL + ' WHERE ' + @WhereClause END EXEC sp_executesql @SQL
END

procedure.name: Status_Find
procedure.body:
IF ISNULL(@SearchUsingOR, 0) <> 1 BEGIN SELECT [Id] , [Title] , [ColorCode] , [Note] , [IsDisabled] , [CreateUser] , [CreateDate] , [UpdateUser] , [UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[Status] WHERE ([Id] = @Id OR @Id IS NULL) AND ([Title] = @Title OR @Title IS NULL) AND ([ColorCode] = @ColorCode OR @ColorCode IS NULL) AND ([Note] = @Note OR @Note IS NULL) AND ([IsDisabled] = @IsDisabled OR @IsDisabled IS NULL) AND ([CreateUser] = @CreateUser OR @CreateUser IS NULL) AND ([CreateDate] = @CreateDate OR @CreateDate IS NULL) AND ([UpdateUser] = @UpdateUser OR @UpdateUser IS NULL) AND ([UpdateDate] = @UpdateDate OR @UpdateDate IS NULL)
END ELSE BEGIN SELECT [Id] , [Title] , [ColorCode] , [Note] , [IsDisabled] , [CreateUser] , [CreateDate] , [UpdateUser] , [UpdateDate] FROM [dbo].[Status] WHERE ([Id] = @Id AND @Id is not null) OR ([Title] = @Title AND @Title is not null) OR ([ColorCode] = @ColorCode AND @ColorCode is not null) OR ([Note] = @Note AND @Note is not null) OR ([IsDisabled] = @IsDisabled AND @IsDisabled is not null) OR ([CreateUser] = @CreateUser AND @CreateUser is not null) OR ([CreateDate] = @CreateDate AND @CreateDate is not null) OR ([UpdateUser] = @UpdateUser AND @UpdateUser is not null) OR ([UpdateDate] = @UpdateDate AND @UpdateDate is not null) SELECT @@ROWCOUNT END
